infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: NatureUP Health needs access to your microphone for voice coaching sessions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: NatureUP Health needs your location to suggest nearby nature excursions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: NatureUP Health needs camera access to capture nature moments during excursions.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow NatureUP Health to use your location to find nearby nature excursions.
